solution_line_template: Total amount spent for athletic shoes and sportswear is ${sneakers_cost} + ${outfit_cost} = $<<{sneakers_cost}+{outfit_cost}={non_racket_total}>>{non_racket_total}.
The price of the racket is ${total_spent} - ${non_racket_total} = $<<{total_spent}-{non_racket_total}={racket_price}>>{racket_price}.
